players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I find it strange that Alice was the one found dead during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."

You: "I believe it's important that we all cooperate and work together to figure out who among us is the mafioso. Based on what happened last night, I suggest we focus our suspicion on Charlie since he was the last one to interact with Alice before she was found dead."

Charlie: "Let's all stay vigilant and be honest with each other. I can assure you that I didn't kill Alice, but I understand your suspicion. Let's use the day to gather more information and discuss our strategies."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
